Don't Let Your Source Code Backups Fall Behind

Managing source code backups can be challenging without the right tools, exposing your valuable code to a variety of risks. Here's how Codekeeper Backups can help you overcome these problems:

Outdated Backups

Manually managing backups can result in outdated or missing backups when they're needed the most. Codekeeper Backups automates the process, ensuring your backups are always up to date and ready for recovery.

Inconsistent Backup Schedules

Juggling multiple repositories across different platforms can lead to inconsistent backup schedules. Codekeeper Backups centralizes and streamlines the backup process, allowing you to manage all your repositories in one place.

Limited Backup Storage

Running out of storage space can hinder your backup strategy, forcing you to compromise on data retention. Codekeeper Backups provides unlimited data storage, giving you the freedom to protect all your projects without worrying about storage limits.

Complex Recovery Process

Recovering lost code can be time-consuming and complicated without the right solution. Codekeeper Backups simplifies the recovery process, enabling you to easily browse your backed-up repositories and restore code with just a few clicks.

Inadequate Security Measures

Storing backups without proper security measures can leave your code vulnerable to theft and unauthorized access. Codekeeper Backups employs state-of-the-art encryption and security measures to keep your code safe and secure.

Don't let your codebase be held back by subpar backup practices.

How it works

Safeguard your source code in three simple steps with Codekeeper Backups.

Sign Up and Connect Your Repositories

Create your Codekeeper Backups account and effortlessly link your GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, or Azure DevOps repositories.

Configure Your Backup Preferences

Choose your backup frequency, set custom schedules, and specify which repositories you want to protect.

Monitor and Manage Your Backups

Access your dashboard to monitor backup status, manage repository settings, and recover lost code easily.
